concept.title: Notes
concept.shortdesc: Notes are output with the aside element except when @importance is set to low or obsolete, which will output a details elements. Details elements should be collapsed by default on new browsers.

section.title: Notes nested into a paragraph
section.p: When a marginalia is in used, if the note is nested within a paragraph, the not will appear in the marginalia beside the paragraph.
